text: Ðis is ðæt landgemær into salewarpan ærest ondlong þære ea saloworpe in colford of colford in uæles broc.
Ondlong þæs sihtran in ðone ealdan secg mor.
Of ðam ealdan secgmor onan betwynan acwudu and wulle lea.
And swa æfre betwyx þam twam wudan in alra broc.
And swa æfre æfter þam broke in þone oðerne colford.
And swa eft in saloworpan.
Ærest æt colford onlang streames<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymeð þær dofe dæl and salewarpe togædere licgað.
Ondlang dofer dæles on geing stream to wicforda<../images/tbar.gif>swa ondlang dices on butan þone wudu.
<../images/tbar.gif>swa andlang stræte ymb coll hyll.
<../images/tbar.gif>swa in salewarpan.
Ond æt hunigburnan twegen weorðias.
And twegen aceres earðlandes.
And æt heanlege feower akeras.
And æt birne burnan on twa healfe<../images/tbar.gif>medwe land to bærlege sice.
And þær birne burne.
And sale warpe to somne licgað oðer half acer mæð landes.
And on bradan medwad XII æceras mæð landes & on oðre stowe threo akeras.
And on wictune an feorda dæl wudulandes & feldlandes.
And to ðissum lande gebyreð VIII æceras æt colforda.
Þæt swa eft on colforda.
And æt neoðe mæstan wic IIII fata stal.
And VIII ringas brynan, V on easthealfe & III on westhealfe.
And on middel wic, VIII fata stall.
And þeo bryne þærto<../images/tbar.gif>mon mæge beon wel nyt & untodælede bryne.
